title: Caught Offside: I Told You So
description:
We take a look at week 1 of the Premier League season as Haaland quiets his critics while United amplify theirs. Plus, how seriously should Tim Ream be considered for a spot on Gregg's team sheet? All that plus: Spurs' fitness, Fulham's dry pitch and MLS at the break.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Caught Offside: Examining matchday 1 of the Premier League season
